tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE AlgorithmLogs (
 algorithm_id INT,
 step_name VARCHAR(255),
 timestamp TIMESTAMP,
 log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE step_logs (
    step_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT,
    step_name VARCHAR(255),
    step_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE algorithm_changes (
    change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    algorithm_id INT,
    change_type VARCHAR(50),
    change_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE step_changes (
    change_id INT,
    step_id INT,
    change_type VARCHAR(50),
    change_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE AlgorithmSteps (
  step_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  step_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE StepChanges (
  change_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  step_id INT,
  change_time TIMESTAMP,
  change_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE StepLogs (
  log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  step_id INT,
  log_time TIMESTAMP,
  log_message TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TriggerLogs (
  trigger_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  step_id INT,
  trigger_time TIMESTAMP,
  trigger_action TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE TriggerErrors (
  error_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trigger_id INT,
  error_time TIMESTAMP,
  error_message TEXT
)
